title._content: Image taken from page 7 of '[Sir John Froissart's Chronicles of England, France, Spain, Portugal, Scotland, Brittany, Flanders and the adjoining countries. Translated from the original French, by J. Bourchier, Lord Berners. Reprinted from Pynson's edition

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "[Sir John Froissart's Chronicles of England, France, Spain, Portugal, Scotland, Brittany, Flanders and the adjoining countries. Translated from the original French, by J. Bourchier, Lord Berners. Reprinted from Pynson's edition of 1523 and 1525; with the names of persons and places carefully corrected. To which are added, a memoir of the translator, and a copious index to the work [by E. V. Utterson].]" Author: FROISSART, Jean. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 1309.e.15-18." Volume: 03 Page: 7 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1814 Publisher: J. Davis Edition: [Another edition.] The Antient Chronicles of Sir John Froissart, etc. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001334246 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals. If you wish to purchase a high quality copy of the page that this image is drawn from, please order it here. Please note that you will need to enter details from the above list - such as the shelfmark, the page, the book's volume and so on - when filling out your order. Following this or the link above will take you to the British Library's integrated catalogue.
